systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource

location.Description: The supported Azure location where the dedicated HSM should be created.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created dedicated hsm resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created dedicated hsm resource.

createdAt.Description: The timestamp of dedicated hsm resource creation (UTC).

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified dedicated hsm resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified dedicated hsm resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of dedicated hsm resource last modification (UTC).

networkProfile.Description: Specifies the network interfaces of the dedicated hsm.

managementNetworkProfile.Description: Specifies the management network interfaces of the dedicated hsm.

stampId.Description: This field will be used when RP does not support Availability zones.

subnet.Description: Specifies the identifier of the subnet.

networkInterfaces.Description: Specifies the list of resource Ids for the network interfaces associated with the dedicated HSM.

id.Description: The ARM resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...
The ARM resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

privateIpAddress.Description: Private Ip address of the interface
